translations: 艰难（hardship 复数形式）；困苦

sentences.sentence: He never forgot the hardships he witnessed during the Great Depression of the 1930s.
sentences.translation: 他从未忘记20世纪30年代经济大萧条时期他所目睹的艰辛。

sentences.sentence: It will build their ability to endure hardships.
sentences.translation: 这会培养他们吃苦耐劳的能力。

sentences.sentence: People suffered many hardships during that long winter.
sentences.translation: 在那个漫长的冬季，人们吃了很多苦头。
